select id,name_en,name_zh,url,CAST((select max(name_${lang}) from v_dictionary where mkey='RESOURCEPID' and val=resource.pId) as char) as pNode, CAST((select max(name_${lang}) from v_dictionary where mkey='RESOURCETYPE' and val=resource.type) as char) as typename,code,sort, CAST((select max(name_${lang}) from v_dictionary where mkey='RESOURCEURLTYPE' and val=resource.urltype) as char) as urltype, CAST((select max(name_${lang}) from v_dictionary where mkey='ACTIVETYPE' and val=resource.active) as char) as active from resource where 1=1
and (name_zh like '${name}%' or name_en like '${name}%') and urltype=${urltype} and active=${active}
